name: King's Squire (In Effect)
description: During this Round, spend 2 less Elemental Dice the next time the character uses an Elemental Skill or equips a Talent card.
descriptionraw: During this Round, spend 2 less Elemental Dice <color=#FFFFFFFF>the next time the character uses an Elemental Skill or equips a {SPRITE_PRESET#3006}Talent card.</color>
descriptionreplaced: During this Round, spend 2 less Elemental Dice <color=#FFFFFFFF>the next time the character uses an Elemental Skill or equips a {SPRITE_PRESET#3006}Talent card.</color>
